div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:53 am CDT

div.div: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 3pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 71. South southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
A chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 73. Calm wind becoming northwest around 6 mph in the morning.
